## ITransferable.setRestrictedTransfer() method

Setter for transfer restriction.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
setRestrictedTransfer(restrict: boolean): Promise<TransactionReceipt>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  restrict | boolean | Boolean indicating whether to restrict transfer. (default: true) |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;TransactionReceipt&gt;
